snippet: The move is widely seen as bolstering Mr. Kim’s authority over the military, which analysts say he has been trying to tame through a reshuffling of top generals.
abstract: North Korea announces that its leader, Kim Jong-un, has assumed the title of marshal, a move widely seen as aimed at bolstering his authority over the military, which analysts say he has been trying to tame through a reshuffling of top generals.
lead_paragraph: The move is widely seen as bolstering Mr. Kim’s authority over the military, which analysts say he has been trying to tame through a reshuffling of top generals.

headline.seo: Hyon Yong-chol Promoted to Vice Marshal in North Korea
headline.main: North Korea’s Kim Jong-un Takes Title of Marshal
headline.print_headline: North Korea Shift Seen as Curb on Military
